# Pulumi Shared Library

Shared Pulumi components and utilities for Go-based IaC projects.

## Core Packages

- [`pkg/lib/`](pkg/lib/): Resource abstractions for AWS, GCP, Scaleway, Hetzner, GitHub, GitLab, Vault, and Kubernetes.
- [`pkg/util/`](pkg/util/): Utilities for files, encoding, Pulumi types, and metadata.
- [`pkg/model/`](pkg/model/): Common data structures and interfaces.

## Usage

```bash
go get github.com/muhlba91/pulumi-shared-library
```

Most resources follow the `Create(ctx, opts)` pattern.

## Development

- `make fix`: Format code.
- `make lint`: Run linters.
- `make test`: Run tests.
